entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 3:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Periods of drizzle inland. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 1:17 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 1:17 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 1:17 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
